meanings.definition: Having the most distinctive or characteristic style or manner
meanings.sent1: She always wore the shtickiest hats to stand out.
meanings.sent2: The clown's shtickiest performance was the highlight of the show.
meanings.sent3: His shtickiest dance move made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The shtickiest joke in the comedy show had the audience roaring with laughter.
meanings.sent5: The shtickiest character in the play left a lasting impression on the audience.

meanings.definition: The most prominent or memorable aspect or feature
meanings.sent1: The shtickiest of all was the giant cake at the party.
meanings.sent2: In the movie, the shtickiest scene was the car chase.
meanings.sent3: The shtickiest part of the magic show was when the rabbit disappeared.
meanings.sent4: Her shtickiest talent was juggling flaming torches.
meanings.sent5: The shtickiest moment of the concert was when the singer crowd-surfed.
